# an [[ostrich]] [[feather]] placed in a [[hat]]
# a [[bouquet]] of feathers used to [[decorate]] [[military]] [[headgear]]
# a bouquet of feathers used to decorate a [[dais]], a [[bed]], or a [[hearse]]

types.html:
plumet m (plural plumets)

  1. an ostrich feather placed in a hat
  2. a bouquet of feathers used to decorate military headgear
  3. a bouquet of feathers used to decorate a dais, a bed, or a hearse
  4. feathergrass (Stipa pennata)
  5. a bundle of feathers attached to a piece of cork which is allowed to float in order to determine the direction of the wind
trans: an ostrich feather placed in a hat
a bouquet of feathers used to decorate military headgear
a bouquet of feathers used to decorate a dais, a bed, or a hearse
a bundle of feathers attached to a piece of cork which is allowed to float in order to determine the direction of the wind
